name: Bounty Hunting (Title Pending)
description: Hello coming from everyone here on the Bounty Hunting (Title Pending) dev team and thank you being here! Bounty Hunting (Title Pending) is your classic top-down RPG game with enemies to match. The game (is planned to) goes as follows, you are a bounty hunter, who kills monsters that have a bounty placed on them for the money that they give. You start in your home, waking up like any usual day to kill monsters you go about various areas finding new beings to defeat for money, before going back home to enjoy the rest of your day. However, one day the world seems to have taken a liking to these beings, you now must integrate these beings that you killed into your daily life, but how will you make money again? Only your next job knows
